objects.name: Analytic 1143
objects.description: Cloud-hosted VM or container generates spoofed UDP requests to third-party services on known amplifier ports, with high outbound-to-inbound traffic ratios in VPC Flow Logs

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: AWS:CloudTrail
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Create egress rule allowing UDP to port 53, 123, 11211

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: AWS:VPCFlowLogs
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Large outbound UDP traffic to multiple public reflector IPs

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: AWS:CloudWatch
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Sudden spike in network output without a corresponding inbound request ratio

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Cloud security group rules permitting UDP to reflector protocols
Ratio threshold to flag traffic as potential reflection behavior
Cloud metadata that can help scope anomalous behavior to development, testing, or external-facing services
